item.title: Resume
item.description: A passionate full stack web developer and DIY enthusiast from Hermosillo, Sonora. Professional Experience Soluciones Verdes | June 2019 - Today Full Stack web development using Django, Docker and PostgreSQL. An online platform for web courses and student certification. Ecloud Studio | January 2019 - June 2019 Android mobile development using Java and Kotlin. Patched a few issues from a legacy transport application and helped planning and designing mockups for a new version.

item.title: About
